meanings.definition: Showing affection or love through kisses
meanings.sent1: The puppy gave the smoochiest kisses to its owner.
meanings.sent2: She received the smoochiest kiss from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The smoochiest puppy in the park made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sun painted the sky with the smoochiest shades of pink.
meanings.sent5: The smoochiest teddy bear was the most popular toy at the store.

meanings.definition: The act of kissing in a tender or romantic way
meanings.sent1: Their smoochiest was captured in a photo at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The movie ended with a beautiful smoochiest between the main characters.
meanings.sent3: The smoochiest in the romantic comedy scene was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The smoochiest of the waves against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The smoochiest under the mistletoe was a tradition at the party.

meanings.definition: Describing someone or something as extremely affectionate or loving
meanings.sent1: The smoochiest cat would always curl up on her lap.
meanings.sent2: He wrote the smoochiest love letter to his crush.
meanings.sent3: The smoochiest flower in the garden bloomed brightly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the smoochiest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The smoochiest hug from her best friend warmed her heart.
